While Sparta was incredibly successful at its peak, it refused to change and adapt, and thus it was eventually broken by the superior tactics of the democratic Theban Confederation in the Battle of Leuctra. Thus, the society that allowed more flexibility and innovation defeated the society that focused entirely on warfare and was convinced of its inflexible superiority.
